author: Special Correspondent
text:
Farmers organisations have condemned police assault on a farmer in Thanjavur district while seizing a tractor apparently after he defaulted on repayment of a loan from a private bank.

A meeting of all farmers’ associations of the district held here on Thursday with Puliyur A. Nagarajan, president, farmers’ wing of the Tamil Maanila Congress, took strong exception to the manner in which the bank authorities had seized the tractor using recovery agents and with the support of police.

P. Ayyakannu, president, Desiya-Thennindia Nadigal Inaippu Vivasayigal Sangam, threatened to launch a fast in New Delhi if action was not taken against the police for assaulting the farmer.
title: Thanjavur: Farmers demand action against policeman
